item.title: The easiest way to share files within same network
item.description: Sometimes you are just to lazy to copy files to local storage server. Sending files over email ? To long. What other options you have. If you are on Mac – AirDrop is an answer but – you have to be on wireless. What if you are using old fashion cable ? There is a solution for that – web experiment called www.sharedrop.io ShareDrop is a free app that allows you to easily and securely share files directly between devices in the same local network*, without having to upload them to any server first.
